https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/kW1sOXJJQ4GaWSLcOBx7rYsqf3t.jpg Slacker Ichiko gets into a fight with her younger sister and begins to live on her own, working the late shift at a 100 yen shop. On her way home, she passes a gym and meets middle-aged boxer Kano who trains there in silence... 100 Yen Love
